dcterms:creator: Prithviraj Sen
Galileo Namata
Mustafa Bilgic
Lise Getoor
Brian Galligher
Tina Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset where a network is a directed network where a node represents a document and an edge is a citation link, meaning that there exists an edge when a document cites a document, or vice-versa with a direction. Each node is labeled with the class to which it belongs.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: Oleksandr Shchur
Maximilian Mumme
Aleksandar Bojchevski
Stephan Gannemann
dcterms:description: The dataset for co-authorship graphs based on the Microsoft Academic Graph from the KDD Cup 2016 Challenge. In the graphs, a node is an author and an edge exists when two authors co-author a paper. A node’s features represent the keywords of its papers and the node’s class label indicates its most active field of study.
dcterms:title: Coauthor Physics

dcterms:creator: Oleksandr Shchur
Maximilian Mumme
Aleksandar Bojchevski
Stephan Gannemann
dcterms:description: The segment of an Amazon co-purchase graph where a node is a good (i.e., product), an edge exists when two goods are frequently bought together. A node’s features are a bag-of-words representation of product reviews and the node’s class label is the product category.
dcterms:title: Amazon Computers

dcterms:description: The segment of an Amazon co-purchase graph where a node is a good (i.e., product), an edge exists when two goods are frequently bought together. A node’s features are a bag-of-words representation of product reviews and the node’s class label is the product category.
dcterms:title: Amazon Photo
